评论详情: I read the reviews and to my disappointment this outfit did not fit the description. I bought the medium size after reading reviews that it ran big and it does. The material is extremely thin and see through, I’m 5’6 and the pants are high water on me they say above my ankles. I’ll be using this as a PJ.
I was not pleased with this 2 piece work out set. The fabric was just too flimsy. The fabric was not made of good quality. The outfit was cute but for me I was unhappy with the fabric.
The bottoms are entirely see-through, and cant be worn in public.

This outfit is so cute, it is very comfortable nit to tight but not to loose very breathable! The material is amazing it is super comfy I would totally wear this on a girls day out. The material is pretty thick and definitely provides some warmth. The outfit is very cute and makes me feel super confident! Amazing outfit for a great price!

Color isn’t the same as the one pictured. I ordered the beige colored one, and it’s more of a khaki tan color. Very stretchy material and tight fitting. The top part of the pants doesn’t fold over as long, so maybe size up if you want more of that look. I typically am a medium, and ordered a medium, it fits well. No strange smell or anything either. Cute for home lounge set.

评论详情: I love this set! Just wish it was made with better material with the same stretch/fit.

The bottoms reminded me of my high school days lol. But both the top and bottoms are super comfortable and stretchy, also feels like you are wearing pajamas. I wanted a SAHM outfit, instead of my usual black leggings or sweats. I definitely recommend.  I’m 5’3, 140lbs and I got a medium
I really like this set it’s plus size friendly I ordered the XL based on other reviews it fits perfect it’s super stretchy I weight to 280 and I’m 5,8 I will be ordering other colors

i bought this set for working out and its supper soft material and stretchy! i am 3m postpartum and have been in size L, after looking at the reviews i decided to get a M and i am glad i did! with the stretchy material you have room! Definitely going to get more colors for the gym/lounge sets😊

This two piece is so comfortable I’m about to buy another one. It’s stretchy cotton so I recommend your size for comfortable and maybe a size down to be a little more snatched. Anyways Im in love and need three more colors 😂

My sister did say it was very much breathable she could move around in it. She could go do a workout and be perfectly fine. Highly would recommend this outfit.
THIS IS THE COMFIEST TWO PIECE SET I HAVE EVER WORN IF YOU ARE THINKING ABOUT GETTING YOU ABSOLUTELY NEED TO GET NO QUESTION

Holds up after washing, no shrinkage. Great quality and fit.

Im 5’4 165lb and got a Large and they fit perfectly. I can see how they will run on the short side for taller girls. They are super soft and very stretchy, material isnt thick which I like. I got the Chocolate color so cant really attest if they are see through or not. They fit well throughout the legs and flare out at the bottom. Got them for plane travel! Im going to get them in black and grey too.
This is comfortable lounge wear but also breathable and light for working out.

I got this for Christmas after having it in my wishlist. it is snug in the right spots and super comfortable and stretchy. it shows bra and panty lines but does not seem see-through. I want to buy other colors :) I'm 5'3 155 lbs and got a size medium

I love this set so much. The material is so soft and light. It’s not too thick and can be worn in the summer and winter. The only reason I’m giving 4 stars is because the inseam of the pants started to rip after about the second wash. It’s cheap enough though that I would just buy a second pair because it’s so comfy!
I love this set . The material is soft , not super thin & has a little stretch to it . I’m 5’1 & 134 pounds & got a medium & it fits perfect . It fits tight but not too tight . I want every color !

Very cute sporty set. I got this as a gift for my daughter for Christmas and she wanted me to order another set in Black. Very true to size

This is a great set the material is thick and stretchy. I only gave it a 4 Star because the shirt rides up a bit when your sitting it would be nice to have an option to do separate sizes but obviously it’s a set and you can’t but otherwise it’s great

I'm keeping them, because I they're for around the house but I'll order a medium next time. I'm 5 ft 3 inches, and weight 130 pounds, with a mature middle aged figure. I will order more but a larger size in hopes the pants will be longer. Just know the top is a crop top but the bottoms are high waisted so it's ok.
This is the cutest 2 piece set the only thing is that it is thin but it is comfortable and I will buy again.
The material and the fit

The ZFLM Casual Workout Two Piece Lounge Set is a must-have! The material is soft, breathable, and perfect for lounging or quick errands. It fits great—flattering and comfortable with a stretchy waistband.  Even after several washes, it keeps its shape and color. Affordable, stylish, and versatile, I’m already planning to grab more colors!
Great quality. Can’t see through them. Buttery soft. Definitely worth your bucks.

The outfit is adorable and absolutely got my bfs attention!😂 The only problem I’ve had is I can’t wear it outside the house as while the top fits well the bottoms are super long and will wrap under my shoes while walking, so for now it’s my in house outfit!
I really hate that I have to return this set because it's so cute and comfortable, but unfortunately, the pants are too short. If they made this in tall sizes, I would order one in several colors!
True to size. material matters and they feel great. I am in love with these sets 😘
This is perfect! I tried this on and did not want to take it off. The pants are not short at all the shirt is fitted and very comfortable!

I bought this tik tok dupe because I was nervous of getting scammed on tik tok shop. It doesn’t give the “snatched” look as the ones on tik tok do. They are also see through. The pants are more see through and thin than the top is. It’s cute, fits well and has light tummy control but it is not what I expected it to be like. I would NOT buy another set. For reference, I am 5’3 and 138lbs I got a size medium.

the material is super soft & stretchy but the proportions are super off. the small pants barely touch the ground & the small shirt is hanging down to my waist.. i don't feel like returning it for an xsmall would make much of a difference either because the top is more loose in material than the pants... idk i feel like i shoulda bought this type of outfit in person so i could mix & match top & bottom sizes

I am normally a large in everything but I am glad I went down. I am a 34 B, and size 10 in bottoms. THERE IS NO SEE THROUGH, even when I bend over. 5’6 and 165-170 and the length is perfect, no ankles almost goes to my heels
True to size very comfy and great to wear to your hair appointments
Great quality, soft, stretchy but fits really good. You can use it for yoga , run errands , or just a chill day at home.

So comfy and cute. Going to end up buying all colors. Stretchy and accommodates a curvy shape. Fabric will show undergarment lines and is slightly see through.  I'm a size 12 and both the L and XL fit nicely.

I'm really impressed with the ZFLM Casual Workout Two Piece Outfits. The fabric is soft, stretchy, and breathable, making it perfect for workouts of all intensities. The design is both stylish and functional, with a flattering fit that doesn't restrict movement.  The two-piece set is versatile enough to be worn for both workouts and casual outings. The colors are vibrant and the overall quality is excellent. I've washed it several times, and it has held up well.  If you're looking for comfortable and stylish workout clothes, I highly recommend these outfits from ZFLM.  Pros:  Soft, stretchy, and breathable fabric Stylish and functional design Versatile for workouts and casual wear Durable and machine-washable Cons:  None so far
Comfort clothing. I’m 5’3 160lbs the top fits big but nice the bottoms look good too. I got a size medium.
This is so soft, comfy, and fits at a comfortable length for someone 5’6. 10/10 recommend this matching set

Soo comfy and such a flexible and soft material.

So soft, really comfy, great fit

Fits great and body is giving in it lol lol lol.... True to size, super cute.. will be buying another color. im 5'8 210 :)
The set was cute but I had to return because it was way too short on me, very much high waters. I am 5’8 and the pants came up to my ankles :(
This is perfect for anything. It’s so cute and comfortable. Fabric is nice and thick and has upheld multiple washes. Looks really good on and makes my body looks nice too

I actually purchased for my daughter but it’s too tight and she too sharply so it’s mine now lol cute outfit very stylish and comfortable. Handled well in the washer. Not see through when I bend over!

The grey color is that perfect jersey material! Squat proof, great seams, fantastic quality! So I thought I would get more colors, boyyyy is it not the same. I got black and it’s cheap material, see through and rips after 1 wear.

I got the pink and it’s a lovely color. The shirt is amazing and I wear it with jeans or sweatpants all the time. The pants are a little see through so I only wear in the house. It’s very thin and soft with a slight ribbed material. Perfect for warmer fall days.
It fits so well, not too long or short I’m usually a s but I ordered a m because I wanted comfort. It’s fitting and not see through. Will buy another

This set was soo ideal! The level of comfort and stretch was amazing! For a thick girl like me it was a winner! I’m 5”5 and 215lbs, as you can see I have curves and hips, so this set did everything it was supposed to do! Will buy in another color!
Overall happy with this purchase. Fabric is soft and stretchy making it a very comfortable fit. Wish the fabric was a little thicker on the pants but shirt reminds me of a skims dupe.

I love love love this set. The material is light soft and stretchy. It fits beautifully it's true to size BUT once I wash and dry it, it shrunk on me. The gray is after it's been washed and dry and now fits me tighter and shorter. The blue one I just received and it fits me perfectly and the pants leg reach the floor. For reference I'm 5''5 size M. I would recommend sizing up if you're tall. Update: size L shrank as well. Too short for me
Very comfortable, wore it to my aunties baby shower but after washing the outfit my pants shrunk and I was now flooding.
Love this set so much!! Super stretchy! I’m usually a small/medium and I ordered an extra small and it fits great. About to order it in more colors!
I love this set but im 5’4 and the pants are too short on my legs. I’m struggling to find a different set just like this one but with longer pant length.
This outfit is so soft and stretchy i ordered a small and planned to wear once i give birth but i tried it on while 37 weeks pregnant and it fits so well even now! I love it!!
Fits perfectly!

It’s really nice but too clingy.  If you prefer clothes that do not show too much, this isn’t for you.  For me personally I could not wear it to the gym because it’s too revealing in someways.  But I wear it around the house like loungewear very comfortable

Very cute, see through and smelt like it was sprayed by a skunk. That could’ve happened on its way here. I would get a darker color or wear skin colored underwear and bra. It’s thin so it’s breathable. It’s ok for the amount it cost especially when there’s different sellers selling this set.
Extremely comfortable and stretchy! Also super cute on! It’s the perfect fall casual outfit 😍
Long and fits nice

When it first arrived I was in awe! This was so flattering and very nostalgic with the fold over waist! It’s so soft and so cute and actually a heavier material than I was expecting. I was waiting to write a review until I washed it to see how it would hold up. It did shrink a tiny bit and is no longer as buttery soft as it was. After washing it did become see through. I still think for the price it was worth it if you’re looking for something around the house! For reference I am 5’4 180 and bought a large.
The xsmall felt more like medium but texture is nice

I love the feel of the material! It fits really well! I got a size M, i am 5,3 and the length is perfect, definitely can fit a taller girlie . I weigh about 140ish and it’s perfect. Hides my tummy well.
do not recommend save your money. It smells weird and the material feels like shein. Make you look like you have a 🐫. Save your money…
